examples: the play was a dismal flop

definitions.text: a sculpture of the head and shoulders of a person
an occasion for excessive eating or drinking
examples: they went on a bust that lasted three days

definitions.text: search without warning, make a sudden surprise attack on
examples: The police raided the crack house

definitions.text: separate or cause to separate abruptly

examples: The old chair finally fell apart completely

definitions.text: break open or apart suddenly and forcefully
